author: jimmygchen
content: If we have more fullnodes - we can better test networking and sync. Enough supernodes gives us more stability though so we don't keep relaunching. It may be useful to keep the same amount of supernodes but bump up fullnodes?

author: agnxsh
content: yes

author: agnxsh
content: +1 on that

author: barnabasbusa
content: we would need 32 well engineered full nodes to have full subnet coverage
